metadata.title: CVE-2024-39504 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nft_inner: validate mandatory meta and payloadCheck for mandatory netlink attributes in payload and meta expressionwhen used embedded from the inner expression, otherwise NULL pointerdereference is possible from userspace.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
